Question: A November 2003 Gallup poll estimated that 73% of American adults had a favorable view of this person.
Hints: In 1997, Cook tried to sue this person for $20 million for allegedly blocking a tell-all book about their alleged relationship.
In 2008, The New York Times reported that The ____ Show, with Arabic subtitles, was broadcast twice each weekday on MBC 4.
This person was the only living woman to make the list.
